name: Blobworld (Léon)
description:
Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to wait.

Be careful : the blob is everywhere, the blob is evolving and the blob is dangerous.

Good luck

Credits :
Code, art, etc : Léon 2020
Inspired by The Coding Train
Font : Proggy Clean
Code, assets, license : Github

Feel free to share your score if you're proud of it.
